articles.title: 'Hedge fund nirvana' - Financial Times
articles.description: Shorts stink a bit less at least
articles.content:
Equity long-short hedge funds have had a miserable decade both in terms of performance and flows. MainFT last week published a very good piece on the theme.
But in one small but important respect, t… [+2955 chars]

articles.title: Glencore to sell stake in lossmaking New Caledonia nickel operations - Financial Times
articles.description: Production suspended after sharp fall in price of metal used for stainless steel and electric car batteries
articles.content: Glencore plans to suspend production and sell its stake in the Koniambo nickel operations in New Caledonia after a sharp slump in price for the metal, a component of stainless steel and electric car … [+3014 chars]

articles.author: Tim Ingham
articles.title: EQT, Denis Ladegaillerie, and TCV launch $1.64 billion takeover bid for Believe - Music Business Worldwide
articles.description: Will Believe be privately owned by the summer? That’s the hope of a new consortium, which has announced a €1.523 billion ($1.64 billion) takeover bid.
articles.content:
Will Believe be privately owned by the summer?
That’s the hope of a new consortium, which today (February 12) has announced a takeover bid worth EUR1.523 billion (USD $1.64 billion) for 100% of the … [+5215 chars]

articles.author: Sudarshan Varadhan
articles.title: Oil starts week lower after Israel says 'concluded' Gaza strikes - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices fell in early Asian trade on Monday after Israel said it had "concluded" a series of strikes in southern Gaza, slightly easing concerns about supply from the Middle East.
